TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OperationFormatStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the SOAP style that determines how the WSDL metadata for the service is formatted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatStyle Document = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Causes the WSDL representation to contain a single element that represents the document that is exchanged for the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatStyle Rpc = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Causes the WSDL representation of messages exchanged for an operation and contains parameters as if it were a remote procedure call.
